attributes.action: Keep Jury Trials - do not suspend them as proposed.
attributes.additional_details:
Simon Davis, Law Society president said “that to interfere with such a bedrock of the criminal justice system was an extreme measure that required extreme justification.”

I think this will disproportionately affect minorities who are not represented in the judiciary 
https://www.lawgazette.co.uk/news/legislation-to-abolish-some-jury-trials-could-be-passed-within-weeks/5104739.article
attributes.background:
Do not pass legislation to remove jury trials as proposed.
(This is being proposed to reduce backlog)
